name: Afterbern
description:
Take control of the Elder Statesman and rain down the fury of the 99% upon the ravenous, soul-starved hordes of America’s premier banking institution in AFTERBERN, a bite-sized top down hack ‘n’ slash serving up revolutionary justice in the pre-apocalyptic present.



Wield the Demo Placard of Inifinite Rage and a range of Quantum Dialectical skills against the bankers in fast-paced single-player combat!



Battle brokers, analysts, personal assistants, and CEOs armed with golf clubs, cocaine bombs, and the ferocious power of attack yoga!



AFTERBERN. Don't just get woke: get even!
